--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ObservationDefinition","id":"c99dbe7d-1dd2-4e32-b0f1-f4cb588d197d","code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://loinc.org","code":"15074-8","display":"Glucose [Moles/volume] in Blood"}]},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:18.385+08:00"}}'
